really disappointed we didn't actually get new lore going, to be honest, feel like many champions are forgotten in more senses than one and I was hoping this would help wake interest in them while also showing more of them.

We have tons of lore planned going forward through the year! A couple weeks here and there will be lighter (like this one), but we hope to have some cool behind the scenes style content to show in those gaps.

Sorry that recent stuff hasn't grabbed your attention, hopefully we'll have something soon that you'll be interested in! Lots of stories to tell!

So, you made us hyped with Demacia with all this going here and there, hopefully culminating into Kayle's return now with the Sylas insurgence and will just let it there hanging? Correct me if I'm wrong but I remember reading in a dev blog that "leaving story hooks is bad both for the writer and the reader". Also, in the recent video at the start of the season you said ".. lore makes you think like the league universe is frozen in place. We're gonna change that."

Demacia's relationship with magic, and what's going on with Sylas, Garen, and Lux will be explored further in the League of Legends: Lux comic series! We'll have more details to share on that soon! 

We think the Demacia storyline and what's going on there with mages is a great place to start the clock ticking forward.

Oh ok, that sounds great! Thought the Lux comic would be more focused on her, starting from her childhood and reaching up to present day, similar to Ashe, not telling us much we don't know already.

Thanks for the reply and sorry if I came off harsh. Just your average lore phreak here :)

I've read as much as I can on this alt universe and it begs a few questions out of me. In Kayn's lore it says it works for an emperor which is Jarvan IV which means he's in the Odyssey Universe as well. But from Rhaast's own interactions with the other Dark Star skinned Champs like Thresh and that when he takes over Kayn's body he basically becomes Dark Star Rhaast. From I gather that also means the Dark Star skins are also a part of the Odyssey Universe or they are traveling to these alt universes(Which is fair but as far as I know from Thresh's interactions he's only traveled from galaxy to galaxy from ONE universe) So my questions is since Jarvan also has a Dark Star skin: Is Jarvan already a Dark Star follower and no one just knows of it? Or did Jarvan give Kayn Rhaast hoping he'd be taken over by the scythe serving Rhaast over Thresh?

What can you tell us about Zalt, and what his inclusion in the Winterspike Road story means for Alistar and the Minotaur Race in general in Valoran? Alistar’s bio made it seem like he was the last of his tribe. Is Zalt from another tribe, are there other Minotaur clans in the Great Barrier/Noxus? Was Zalt brought up in in the Reckoning Arenas like Xin Zhao and sold to the army or is he a loyal born Noxian? 
Side note did Viscero ever fight Alistar in the arenas or Zalt if he competed? Is the Fleshing different from Reckoning Areas? Really anything you are able to answer would be great!

Was wondering why you took the description of Ruined King's wife being briefly resurrected as a festering corpse out of Hecarim and Kalista's bios. I know you guys don't like to confirm or deny what you're writing, but will we get more details on what happened there in the future? It seems pretty obvious it's still part of the story but was moved off screen.
